we-can-take-them.context: Caleb silences the doubters after spying the land
we-can-take-them.hebrew: עָלֹה נַעֲלֶה וְיָרַשְׁנוּ אֹתָהּ כִּי־יָכוֹל נוּכַל לָהּ
we-can-take-them.english: Let us by all means go up, and we shall gain possession of it, for we shall surely overcome it

different-spirit.hebrew: וְעַבְדִּי כָלֵב עֵקֶב הָיְתָה רוּחַ אַחֶרֶת עִמּוֹ וַיְמַלֵּא אַחֲרָי
different-spirit.english: But My servant Caleb, because he was imbued with a different spirit and remained loyal to Me

still-strong.context: Caleb at 85 still ready for battle
still-strong.hebrew: עוֹדֶנִּי הַיּוֹם חָזָק כַּאֲשֶׁר בְּיוֹם שְׁלֹחַ אוֹתִי מֹשֶׁה כְּכֹחִי אָז וּכְכֹחִי עָתָּה
still-strong.english: I am still as strong today as on the day that Moses sent me; my strength is the same now as it was then

followed-fully.english: I wholly followed the Lord my God
